name: Cranberry Brie Bites
description: Delight in the perfect harmony of flavors with our Cranberry Brie Bites. Crafted from flaky crescent dough, they're filled with the sweetness of cranberry sauce and the creaminess of beloved brie cheese, all crowned with the satisfying crunch of pecans. These bites are a must-try, especially during the Thanksgiving season.

name: Loaded Deviled Eggs
description: Elevate your dining experience with our Loaded Deviled Eggs. These delightful treats are a holiday staple that brings an extra touch of elegance to your meal. They're easy to make and offer a burst of flavor.

name: Slow-Cooker Buffalo Chicken Dip
description: Secure your spot as the ultimate party guest with our Slow-Cooker Buffalo Chicken Dip. We use Frank's Red Hot sauce for that signature kick, and it pairs perfectly with a cold beer. This dip is addictive in all the right ways.

name: Spicy Bisquick Sausage Balls
description: Our Spicy Bisquick Sausage Balls are a bite-sized explosion of flavor. The heat from hot sausage adds an exciting twist to these savory treats. Grated cheese and the right technique ensure the best results.

name: Bacon-Cheese Gougères
description: Bacon and cheese lovers, rejoice! Our Bacon-Cheese Gougères are a winning combination that's easier to make than you might think. These savory pastries are perfect for potlucks and best enjoyed warm.

name: Picnic Egg Salad
description: Relish our classic Picnic Egg Salad, where boiled eggs are transformed into a timeless recipe. It's an ideal make-ahead dish, ready to serve on toasted baguettes or with crackers for a portable treat.

name: Mary Poached Shrimp
description: Transport your taste buds to a beachside retreat with our Bloody Mary Poached Shrimp. This zesty dish is perfect for a variety of events, from backyard barbecues to holiday cocktail parties. Prepare extra servings because it's bound to be a crowd-pleaser.

name: Jalapeño Popper Dip
description: Get ready for a cheesy delight with our Jalapeño Popper Dip. Made with cream cheese, Cheddar, and Pepper Jack cheese, this dip is a gooey masterpiece that's bubbling and golden brown when it's ready to be devoured.

name: Warm Cheese Box Bites
description: Our Warm Cheese Box Bites are a true comfort food. They're cheesy, bubbly, and golden brown, making them perfect for any occasion. Made with cream cheese, Cheddar, and Pepper Jack cheese, they are a true testament to the power of cheese.

name: Asparagus Ribbon Crostini
description: Experience elegance in every bite with our Asparagus Ribbon Crostini. Delicate asparagus ribbons sit atop baguette slices, transforming a side dish into a spring-ready finger food. Fresh mint adds a burst of color and flavor.

name: Smoked Vidalia
description: Discover elegance in every bite with our Smoked Vidalia dish. This appetizer features ribbons of asparagus a top baguette slices, turning it from a side dish into a spring-inspired finger food. Fresh mint adds a vibrant touch to this culinary masterpiece.

name: Cedar-Plank Salmon
description: Indulge in the joy of a festive main course with our Cedar-Plank Salmon. A generous salmon fillet graces your plate, cooked on a cedar grilling plank, infusing it with a subtle smoky flavor. Kickstart your seafood-themed dinner party with grilled oysters and accompany this exquisite fish with a simple tomato salad.

name: Braised Chicken Legs With Grapes and Fennel
description: When seeking a standout dinner party dish, look no further than our Braised Chicken Legs With Grapes and Fennel. This sweet-and-spicy braise, adorned with ribbons of fennel and luscious table grapes, elevates the humble chicken. Be sure to have a loaf of bread on hand for sopping up the delectable sauce.

name: Grilled Pork Spareribs With Soda Bottle Barbecue Sauce
description: Experience rich, meaty flavors in less time with our Grilled Pork Spareribs. These succulent ribs come with two sauce options, featuring your choice of Coca-Cola or ginger ale. A delightful departure from traditional barbecue brisket.

name: Habanero BBQ Shrimp
description: Our Habanero BBQ Shrimp marinate in a sweet-and-spicy blend of apricot preserves, lime juice, habanero, soy sauce, garlic, and ginger. Grill them for a quick 20-minute dinner, and consider pairing them with our simple grilled corn recipe for a satisfying meal.

name: Caesar Salad Roast Chicken
description: Prepare for a unique twist on the classic chicken Caesar with our Caesar Salad Roast Chicken. The chicken, whether whole or just the legs with thigh and drumstick attached, gets smothered in a garlicky dressing and roasted to perfection. Golden croutons soak up the roast chicken juices before joining crunchy lettuce in a truly extraordinary dish.

name: Mast Biryani (Grand Vegetable Biryani)
description: For special occasions, especially when dining with vegetarians, our Mast Biryani shines. It features a vibrant array of colors, flavors, and textures, boasting creamy paneer, chickpeas, roasted beets, sweet potatoes, and a zesty coconut and cilantro sauce.

name: Tamarind-Glazed Black Bass With Coconut-Herb Salad
description: Dinner takes on a celebratory feel with our Tamarind-Glazed Black Bass. Two whole fish receive a brush of tamarind and honey glaze before a quick 25-minute roast. Easier than roast chicken, this dish impresses with its presentation.

name: Slow-Roasted Salmon in Parchment Paper
description: Enjoy the classic technique with a modern twist in our Slow-Roasted Salmon in Parchment Paper. Briny olives and capers, sweet raisins, a splash of rum, and a squeeze of bright lime juice infuse this dish with a punch of flavor.

name: Lamb Chops with Polenta and Grilled Scallion Sauce
description: Grill scallions and jalapeño alongside lamb chops and sliced polenta, then chop them up with fresh basil to make a zesty, spicy, smoky sauce that complements everything on the plate.

name: Mushrooms with Béarnaise Yogurt
description: Elevate grilled mushrooms into a showstopper of a meal with a classic steakhouse-inspired rub and sauce. Pair it with a wedge salad on the side for a complete dining experience.

name: Grilled Pizza
description: Elevate your dining experience with our Grilled Pizza. Specially crafted for the grill, this pizza offers a canvas for your culinary imagination. Customize your toppings or let your taste buds run wild. (And, yes, we won't argue about the need for New York tap water here!)

name: Grilled Chicken Pizza
description: Indulge in the flavors of our Grilled Chicken Pizza, a creation by Chef Brandon Gray of Brandoni Pepperoni in Los Angeles. Enjoy a tangy tomato-vodka sauce base, grilled chicken thighs, and creamy fresh mozzarella atop our pizza dough. After baking to perfection, we finish it with arugula, pickled red onions, and shaved Pecorino Romano cheese.

name: Grilled Pork Spareribs With Soda Bottle Barbecue Sauce
description: Savor the rich, meaty flavors of our Grilled Pork Spareribs. Choose from two delectable sauce options featuring Coca-Cola or ginger ale. It's a delightful departure from traditional barbecue brisket.

name: Cauliflower-Crust Pizza With Tomatoes and Mozzarella
description: For a gluten-free option that doesn't compromise on taste, try our Cauliflower-Crust Pizza. The crust, made with fresh cauliflower rice and almond meal, ensures a gluten-free delight that's perfect for pizza lovers.

name: Caesar Salad Roast Chicken
description: Experience a unique twist on the classic chicken Caesar with our Caesar Salad Roast Chicken. Chicken, whether whole or just the legs with thigh and drumstick attached, is smothered in a garlicky dressing and roasted to perfection. Golden croutons soak up roast chicken juices before joining crunchy lettuce, creating an extraordinary dish.

name: BBQ Mushroom Pizza
description: Try our BBQ Mushroom Pizza, a vegetarian twist on a CPK fan favorite. It features tangy barbecue sauce, a blend of mozzarella and smoked Gouda for richness and smoky flavor, and sweet red onion to satisfy your pizza cravings.

name: Greek Style Pizza
description: Our Greek Style Pizza features a thick and chewy crust, shallow-oiled pans, and a nearly deep-fried bottom. It's not as thick as deep-dish or Sicilian crust but offers a unique and delightful taste.

name: Detroit-Style Pizza
description: Indulge in our Detroit-Style Pizza, where the dough is topped with meat, Wisconsin brick cheese, and delectable toppings before being finished off with sauce. Despite its appearance, this pizza is light, airy, and boasts crispy edges.

name: Quad Cities-Style Pizza
description: Discover the unique flavors of Quad Cities-Style Pizza. This thin-crust pizza, featuring malt in its dough, is topped with sauce, sausage, and cheese before being cooked and cut into strips for a delightful culinary adventure.

name: Margherita Pizza Beans
description: Our Margherita Pizza Beans give a classic twist to pizza beans. Fresh tomatoes, cooked just enough to bring out their full flavor, replace a cooked-down sauce. It's a perfect blend of sweet and savory, suitable for all tomato lovers.

name: Margarita
description: A classic cocktail that features tequila, lime juice, and orange liqueur, typically served with a salted rim. It's known for its refreshing and tangy flavor.

name: Martini
description: A sophisticated cocktail made with gin or vodka and a small amount of vermouth, usually garnished with an olive or a lemon twist. It's a timeless favorite among cocktail enthusiasts.

name: Mojito
description: A Cuban cocktail made with white rum, fresh lime juice, mint leaves, sugar, and soda water. It's a refreshing and minty drink that's perfect for warm days.

name: Pina Colada
description: A tropical delight made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice. This sweet and creamy cocktail transports you to a beach paradise.

name: Old Fashioned
description: A classic whiskey cocktail made with sugar, bitters, and a twist of citrus rind. It's a strong and timeless choice for whiskey lovers.

name: Cosmopolitan
description: A popular cocktail made with vodka, cranberry juice, orange liqueur, and a splash of lime juice. It's known for its vibrant color and fruity taste.

name: Negroni
description: A bitter and bold cocktail made with equal parts gin, Campari, and sweet vermouth. It's a classic Italian favorite with a distinct flavor profile.

name: Daiquiri
description: A simple yet refreshing cocktail made with white rum, lime juice, and simple syrup. It's a great choice for those who enjoy a tart and zesty drink.

name: Piña Colada
description: A tropical delight made with rum, coconut cream, and pineapple juice. This sweet and creamy cocktail transports you to a beach paradise.

name: Savory cocktail
description: A savory cocktail made with vodka, tomato juice, various spices and flavorings, including Worcestershire sauce, hot sauces, garlic, herbs, horseradish, celery, olives, salt, black pepper, lemon juice, lime, celery salt, and/or soy sauce.
